title: Higher Mathematics Education Design in the Digital Transformation Era: Cognitive-Emotional-Social Integrated Learning Model

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customized Design for Supporting Digital Adaptation and Visual/Experiential Learning of Mathematical Concepts for Adult Learners Aged 40+

learning_goals: Learners can explain calculus concepts in three-dimensional space with over 80% accuracy using VR-based simulations.
Learners demonstrate the ability to provide emotional support at least three times during collaborative mathematical problem-solving with peers using online collaboration tools.
Learners sustain learning activities for at least eight hours per week by applying self-directed time management strategies in digital learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
